com.isoterik.mgdx.m2d.components.physics

Class BoxCollider

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.isoterik.mgdx.Component
      • com.isoterik.mgdx.m2d.components.physics.Collider
        • com.isoterik.mgdx.m2d.components.physics.BoxCollider

  • public class BoxCollider
extends Collider
    A collider in the form of a box. Useful for rectangular game objects.

        Creates a new instance given a width and a height

        width - the width of the box
        height - the height of the box

      • BoxCollider

        public BoxCollider()
        Creates a new instance with no dimension. If no dimension is set before the collider is used, it will assume the dimension of its host game object

        Sets the size of the game object. Note: this has no effect if this collider has already been used by Physics2d

        height - the height of the box
